thread.title: Comment on Marques Bolden will be at Big Blue Madness by Jordache
thread.title_full: Comment on Marques Bolden will be at Big Blue Madness by Jordache

author: Jordache
title: Comment on Marques Bolden will be at Big Blue Madness by Jordache
text:
Posted in BB Recruiting , Main | 15 Responses 
The five-star center from Texas will make a return visit to Kentucky for Big Blue Madness according to Andrew Slater of 247Sports. Bolden took his first official visit to Lexington on the weekend of Sept. 2. Bolden has taken an official visit to Duke and will visit Kansas this weekend. 
Bolden will join Harry Giles, De‚ÄôAaron Fox, Malik Monk as recruits in attendance for Big Blue Madness. Trae Young, an elite 2017 point guard and Kentucky commit Sacha Killeya-Jones will also be in attendance. 
Bolden is down to eight schools with Alabama, Duke, Kansas and Kentucky, at the top and Oklahoma, TCU and Wake Forest still on the list. 
Article written by Kindsey Bernhard If your dreams don't scare you, they're not big enough. @kbernhardKSR 15 responses to ‚ÄúMarques Bolden will be at Big Blue Madness‚Äù Ha! October 4, 2015 at 4:53
